name: Rohlinheatagtmuf Hdhaotaotfnllsape'atnsasri
title: Requirement of having lamps is not heavily enforced as they are generally the most useless fixtures. However, distributing high amount of them all over the factory no longer looks like such a pointless exercise, after the night stoped appearing so ridiculously inconsequantial.
author: <NO_NAME>
description:
Allows to adjust length of the day and choose brightness and color of the night, zoom-to-map, night-vision and so on.
(This is a purely graphical change which does not affect the game mechanics.)

Factory moves fast,
growth and maintenance required,
nature does not let.
